text: Japan is scheduled to compete at the 2022 Winter Olympics in Beijing, China, from 4 to 20 February 2022. == Ice hockey == Japan has qualified 23 female competitors to the ice hockey tournament. ===Women's tournament=== Japan women's national ice hockey team qualified by being 6th in the 2020 IIHF World Rankings. They will play in Group B against China and three teams yet to qualify. ==References== Category:Nations at the 2022 Winter Olympics 2022 Winter Olympics
title: Japan at the 2022 Winter Olympics
